org.bladerunnerjs.api

Interface LinkedAsset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Asset
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DirectoryLinkedAsset, SourceModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryAsset, IndexPageAsset, LinkedFileAsset

    public interface LinkedAsset
extends Asset
    An extension of AssetFile, represents any AssetFile that could depend on other AssetFiles. For example an XML file that might reference a source file class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImplicitDependencies(java.util.List<Asset> implicitDependencies) 
      java.util.List<Asset> getDependentAssets(BundlableNode bundlableNode)
      Returns a list of files this LinkedAssetFile depends on
